document.full_text: specialized firefighting teams wednesday battled a remote wildfire touched off by the eruption of the kilauea volcano on hawaii's big island, which has burned some 2,000 acres of national park land.
document.title: hawaii wildfire threatens protected rainforest
lines_and_colors: specialized firefighting teams wednesday battled a remote wildfire touched off by the eruption of the kilauea volcano on hawaii's big island, which has burned some 2,000 acres of national park land.
